name: SharePointAddInVersioning
description: Set version of a SharePoint Add-In
helpMarkDown: Allows to change the version of SharePoint Add-Ins. Supports changing the version before compile time (in AppManifest.xml files) or after compile time (in packaged .app files). [More Information](https://github.com/iozag/sharepoint-build-tasks)
author: IOZ AG

inputs.name: AddInFile
inputs.label: File pattern
inputs.helpMarkDown: Relative path from repo root to the SharePoint AppManifest or Add-In file which should be updated.  Wildcards can be used.  For example `**\AppManifest.xml` for all AppManifests or `**\*.app` for all Add-In files in all sub folders.

inputs.name: Version
inputs.label: Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Version which should be set in the Add-In files.
